name: Panorama

name: Canada
description: Canada is a country in North America. Its ten provinces and three territories extend from the Atlantic to the Pacific and northward into the Arctic Ocean,

name: Italy
description: Italy, a European country with a long Mediterranean coastline, has left a powerful mark. Its capital, Rome, is home to the Vatican landmark art and ancient ruins.

name: Philippines
description: The Philippines, officially the Republic of the Philippines, is an archipelagic island country in Southeast Asia. It is situated in the western Pacific Ocean.

name: Cuba
description: Cuba, officially the Republic of Cuba, is a country comprising the island of Cuba, as well as Isla de la Juventud and several minor archipelagos.
